metadata.description: Replay Craft is a powerful Minecraft Bedrock Edition add-on that enables players to record and replay their in-game actions, similar to the popular ReplayMod for Java Edition. Create by §gDarkBlock Gaming

header.name: ReplayCraft RP v2.1.0-beta
header.description:
Type '?rc' in chat, Enable Beta APIs, 1.21.7× only.
